name: Cute Bekiboo
description:
Cute Bekiboo is a PuzzlePlatformer/Metroivania made during the Game Jam Plus 2020 and based on the malgasy  legend of Kotobekibo who have an outstanding strengh and his wife Faramalemy who is a smart woman. They used to team up as the player team up with his avatar.

Faramalemy is missing. As Bekiboo isn't that smart without his wife anymore, he needs your help. He arrives in an ancient cave where Faramalemy is supposed to be lockdown. Thanks to Bekiboo outstanding strengh, he can Smash the ground to turn the level up and down and create new path.
